description: This is a Java utility class named HeaderWriter designed to insert a header text into output streams. It loads a header template file, translates variables within it, and provides methods to append this header to an output stream or get it as a string.

classes.name: HeaderWriter
classes.description: A utility class to insert header content into output streams, managing loading and translating a header template.

methods.name: appendHeader
methods.description: Loads the header content (if not already loaded) and writes it to the provided PrintWriter, adding a notice that the file is auto-generated.

methods.name: headerToString
methods.description: Returns the header content as a string, loading it if necessary.

methods.name: loadHeader
methods.description: Loads the header template from the file, translates variable placeholders using current date info, and stores it.
